entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: bensaviofernandez/recipe-bot: Quick Recipe Recommender is a lightweight Node.js app that uses Azure Computer Vision to detect ingredients from an image (or accepts a text list), queries those ingredients against a Cosmos DB of ‚Äúeasy‚Äù recipes, then leverages Azure OpenAI (GPT) to generate human-friendly, one-sentence recipe descriptions‚Äîall presented in a clean, browser-based UI

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. entry.title: amish-kumar-07/Amish_Kumar: Simple Portfolio Website is a modern, responsive web application featuring a contact form built using React, Tailwind CSS, and EmailJS. This project enables users to send messages directly via email without needing a backend server, making it an ideal solution for portfolios, personal websites, or lightweight business pages.
entry.content: Simple Portfolio Website is a modern, responsive web application featuring a contact form built using React, Tailwind CSS, and EmailJS. This project enables users to send messages directly via email without needing a backend server, making it an ideal solution for portfolios, personal websites, or lightweight business pages.
